text: ==Courses== B.A Hindi B.A History B.A Economics B.A English B.Sc. Mathematics B.Sc. Physics B.Sc. Chemistry B.Sc. Zoology B.Com. M.Com. Taxation ==Affiliation== Pazhassi Raja N. S. S. College is affiliated to the Kannur University and UGC http://14.139.185.42/newsite/colleges/knr%20arts.htm ==Notable alumni== * K. K. Shailaja Teacher, Minister of Health and Social Welfare, Kerala * Sreenivasan (actor), Screenwriter, Film director, Film producer, farmer * Salim Ahamed, Film director, screenwriter, film producer ==See also== * S.E.S. College, Sreekandapuram * Krishna Menon Women's College * Kannur University * Sir Syed College * Payyannur College ==References== Category:Colleges affiliated to Kannur University Category:Universities and colleges in Kannur district
title: Pazhassi Raja N. S. S. College, Mattanur
